text: William Cargill may refer to: * William Cargill (Berwick MP) (1813–1894; William Walter Cargill), Conservative Party politician * William Cargill (New Zealand politician) (1784–1860; William Walter Cargill), Scottish-born New Zealand settler and politician * William Wallace Cargill (1844–1909), American business executive and founder of Cargill, Inc ==See also== * Cargill (surname) * * Cargill (disambiguation) * William (disambiguation)
title: William Cargill
